item.description:
The Hunger & Homelessness Auction is upon us. The H&H Auction raises thousands
of dollars for vital New Haven charities, and I write to encourage you to be a
part of this event tomorrow night.

Date: Friday November 9
Time: Cocktail hour and Silent Auction 5:00 P.M. Live Auction 6:00 P.M.
Location: Marigolds, Harkness Hall, 367 Cedar Street

The Silent Auction is already in progress in the library rotunda and will
continue until shortly before the festivities begin on Friday evening.
Specialty items include lodging in Aruba, Salt Lake City, Martha?s Vineyard, a
Eurorail Global Flexpass, tickets to the New York Philharmonic, and much more.

This year's event is specially catered by ?It?s All about the Food? and
complimentary wine and cocktails are also included.

Thank you for supporting our students and our community. We look forward to
seeing you on Friday!
item.name: Get Compiments for a Year
